quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an fast paced round of TextWorld? You do! First thing I need you to do is to travel south. Then, make an effort to go south. And then, make an effort to head west. With that done, move west. Following that, travel north. Then, go to the east. Once you do that, make an effort to take a trip north. Once you succeed at that, make an effort to go north. Then, make an attempt to head west. Next, take the blender from the counter inside the canteen. Got that? Good!

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a canteen. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the counter. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. A standard kind of place.

 You see a mantelpiece. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a mantelpiece, go to TextWorld. The mantelpiece is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the mantelpiece you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in an office.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a fudge scented safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The fudge scented safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The fudge scented safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a desk. The desk is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_2]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a washroom.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just walked into a bathroom. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Hopefully, this discovery doesn't ruin your TextWorld experience![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a rack. The rack is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_4] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] However, the rack, like an empty rack, has nothing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You're now in a bar.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a dish-pit, cool, but is it ordinary? You better believe it is.

 You see a saucepan. [if there is something on the s_5]On the saucepan you see [a list of things on the s_5]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well[end if] You can see a plate. [if there is something on the s_6]On the plate you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a basement. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You scan the room for a stand, and you find a stand. The stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_7] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. A typical one.

 You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedroom. A normal kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a bed stand. The bed stand is typical.[if there is something on the s_8] On the bed stand you can see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a bookshelf. The bookshelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_10] On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You make out a recliner. The recliner is usual.[if there is something on the s_9] On the recliner you can make out [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Silly recliner, silly, empty, good for nothing recliner.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You arrive in a salon. A typical kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a pantry like it isn't some huge deal.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've entered a spare room.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a crate.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The crate is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a studio.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a table. [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the table. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the playroom.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a study.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. A normal kind of place.

 You see a drawer. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You smell a wretched smell, and follow it to a shelf. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_12] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_12].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the shelf! oh well.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. A standard one.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Ah, the garage. This is some kind of garage, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.desc: The door looks manageable. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Welcome to another exciting episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, attempt to venture south. After that, head south. Then, head west. With that done, make an attempt to move west. After that, make an attempt to take a trip north. Okay, and then, travel east. After that, make an effort to travel north. And then, attempt to venture north. With that accomplished, travel west. And then, recover the blender from the counter. Got that? Good!
